channel.title: Auto Donation System
channel.description:
I tried adding an auto donation system to my server. [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/328304-pi-auto-donation-system-items-new.html]It was this one[/url]. I know what the problem is but i dont know how to fix it This is a run batch error and it's here [QUOTE][7/18/11 7:31 PM]: java.lang.Exception: connection is null[7/18/11 7:31 PM]: at server.util.SQL.getConnection(SQL.java:51)[7/18/11 7:31 PM]: at server.util.SQL.checkStatus(SQL.java:67)[7/18/11 7:31 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.destruct(Client.java:1106)[7/18/11 7:31 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:338)[7/18/11 7:31 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:134)[7/18/11 7:31 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:162)[7/18/11 7:31 PM]: at server.GUI.main(GUI.java:412[/QUOTE]
I think i went wrong adding the method where it connects to the Database [QUOTE]Now search for the logout method and below: PlayerSave.saveGame(this); Add this: [CODE] SQL.createConnection(); SQL.checkStatus(this); SQL.destroyConnection();[/CODE][/QUOTE] This is in client.java if you want me to post it btw
